metadata.title: CVE-2018-6541 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In ZZIPlib 0.13.67, there is a bus error caused by loading of a misalignedaddress (when handling disk64_trailer local entries) in__zzip_fetch_disk_trailer (zzip/zip.c). Remote attackers could leveragethis vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted zip file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6541` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzzip-0-13 - 0.13.62-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1
zziplib-bin - 0.13.62-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zziplib package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.62-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1').
